Rey.Action: Glances up kindly at an old woman cleaning salvage, getting lost in the simple moment.
Returns to work without responding negatively to a barking alien underling.
Barely shows disappointment when her boss underpays her, nods thanks politely.
Swallows her resentment when receiving the food packet and thanks ungraciously.
Lives alone in a ramshackle dwelling, creates handmade doll, cooks meticulously for herself.
Sits alone, eats like a starving child, licks the plate clean, and gazes silently at the horizon.
Puts on the broken rebellion helmet as a possible nod to connection and hope.
Risks confrontation to rescue BB-8 from a hostile Teedo, showing protection and concern.
Calmly soothes BB-8 after the confrontation, indicating patience and kindness.
Uses a firm tone to warn BB-8 about local dangers and teases him lightly about his antenna, indicating familiarity and gentle humor.
Uses assertive, commanding speech in an unknown language to intimidate the Teedo and protect BB-8, successfully getting the threat to retreat.
Quickly assesses BB-8's condition, notices and fixes his bent antenna, showing attention to detail and care.
Cuts BB-8 free from the net efficiently despite the threat of the Teedo, showing decisiveness and skill under pressure.
Initially tells BB-8 not to follow her, showing reluctance and dislike, but eventually shows concern and allows him to come along after sensing his loneliness and fear.
Dismisses BB-8 brusquely and orders him away.
Knows and confidently gives clear survival advice about dangerous areas on Jakku, indicating practical knowledge.
Initially refuses BB-8's company, but quickly assesses his situation and reluctantly accepts him as a companion, showing good judgment and adaptability.
Encourages BB-8 not to give up, expressing empathy about waiting for family.
Objects to Unkar Plutt's unfair trade offer, asserting herself despite hunger.
Refuses to sell BB-8 despite being tempted by a large food offer, showing loyalty and care.
Objects to Unkar Plutt's unfair trading terms, showing awareness and assertiveness.
Considers Unkar's high offer for BB-8 but ultimately refuses to sell, demonstrating careful judgment and loyalty.
Tries to maintain a hopeful outlook about her family returning despite emotional difficulty, showing emotional resilience.
Is awkward and uncertain in the negotiation with Unkar Plutt, indicating some social or negotiation inexperience.
Resists thugs trying to take BB-8, fights back fiercely to protect the droid.
Fights off two thugs who try to take BB-8, demonstrating scrappy and feral combat skills, successfully defeating them.
Resists attackers effectively without immediate help, showing confidence and skill in a threatening situation.
Immediately confronts Finn aggressively, attacking him and accusing him of theft, relying on the droid's judgment without initial trust.
Shows protective attitude towards BB-8 and its owner, indicating loyalty and sincerity.
Engages honestly and openly after Finn admits the truth, showing willingness to listen and respond to genuine information.
Observes BB-8's sadness and tries to comfort it, showing empathy and awareness.
Listens and processes new information about the Resistance and Luke Skywalker, showing curiosity and open-mindedness.
Quickly reacts to a sudden threat by moving with Finn despite uncertainty, demonstrating situational awareness and decisiveness.
Expresses confusion and questions Finn's actions (e.g., 'What are you doing?!'), indicating hesitance or lack of confidence momentarily.
Pulls her hand back from Finn, asserts independence by saying 'I know how to run without you holding my hand!'
Expresses concern for BB-8's wellbeing by asking 'Are you okay?'
Insists on running on her own, pulling away from Finn's hand and confidently leads the way through the tent maze under fire.
Keeps BB-8 close and directs movement through a dangerous area, showing situational awareness.
Expresses frustration at Finn but stays focused on escape and survival.
Scrambles to Finn's aid after the explosion, showing concern for his well-being.
Extends her hand to Finn to help him up and lead the way.
Volunteers to pilot the quad-jumper despite lack of certainty, displaying initiative and confidence to help others escape danger.
Calls another ship 'garbage' to others without hesitation.
Encourages herself with 'I can do this' before piloting the Falcon under pressure.
Tells BB-8 to hold on during dangerous maneuvers, showing concern for others.
Despite initial doubt, takes control of the Millennium Falcon and pilots it skillfully under pressure, performing daring maneuvers while evading enemy TIE fighters.
Momentarily lets go of the yoke which almost destabilizes the ship but quickly recovers and stabilizes it, showing quick reflexes but some initial hesitation.
Questions Finn in a somewhat impatient but concerned manner about firing back at enemies.
Acknowledges difficulty piloting without a co-pilot, showing openness and teamwork.
Pilots the Falcon under heavy attack with determination despite uncertainty, showing responsibility and sincerity.
Pilots the Millennium Falcon through a dangerous pursuit, skillfully maneuvering through rock formations and banking sharply despite being under heavy fire.
Strains to operate the ship without a co-pilot, showing willingness to take on responsibility despite difficulty.
Expresses uncertainty inwardly ('I hope') but maintains focus and determination.
Encourages Finn by saying 'Nice shot!' after he destroys a TIE fighter.
Includes Finn in her plan by saying 'Get ready!'
Maneuvers the Millennium Falcon skillfully through a dangerous spaceship graveyard while under attack.
Responds quickly and confidently to the threat of a stuck turret by coming up with a risky but clever idea to evade the enemy.
Shows hesitation or fear when the ship is hit, but overcomes it by focusing and taking decisive action.
Excitedly thanks Finn for his good shooting and shares a light moment of humor with him.
Focuses on piloting and evading danger efficiently, without dismissing or ignoring Finn's contributions.
Reassures BB-8 that he is safe and will get home, includes Finn in the promise by saying 'We both will.'
Looks at Finn with a sweet smile despite knowing he has lied to her.
Immediately asks for help to lift the grating when steam bursts, showing trust and cooperation with Finn.
Quickly responds to BB-8's urgency, helps Finn lift the grating promptly and takes action without hesitation.
Shows clear communication and leadership by directing Finn and calming BB-8.
Displays awareness of the situation by quickly interpreting BB-8's urgent beeps and responding appropriately.
Urgently instructs Finn to grab a tool and tries to fix the ship to ensure survival.
Asks Finn for the location of the Resistance Base from a place of mutual need and concern.
Disappears under the grating, overwhelmed by technical issues but continues attempting to fix the problem.
Immediately prioritizes repairing the ship's propulsion tank to prevent it from flooding with poisonous gas.
Offers to help Finn and BB-8 by dropping them off at Ponemah Terminal despite being focused on her own goals.
Urgently instructs others (Finn) to hurry and find necessary tools rather than expressing frustration or impatience.
Dismisses Finn's personal questions curtly and with annoyance.
Acts decisively and cooperatively to address the life-threatening situation aboard the ship with Finn.
Helps BB-8 despite the difficulty and struggles, shows concern for the droid's well-being.
Quietly responds to Chewbacca's moans, showing understanding and patience.
Truthfully admits to Han Solo that she is the pilot despite being threatened.
Explains honestly how she got the ship by admitting to stealing it from Unkar Plutt.
Expresses awe and excitement about the Millennium Falcon and Han Solo.
Clearly knows the history and lore of the Millennium Falcon, confidently identifies it and Han Solo, shows familiarity with ship's reputation (Kessel Run).
Explains the complex chain of ownership of the ship, demonstrating awareness of local power dynamics and resourcefulness in acquiring the Falcon by stealing it from Unkar Plutt.
Appears awed and somewhat starstruck when Han Solo turns his back and smiles, indicating a possible lack of confidence in the presence of a legendary figure.
Quickly intervenes to ask for help to ensure the droid reaches the Resistance base, showing concern for others' mission and safety.
Seeks assistance from Han Solo without hesitation, indicating trust and openness.
Insists on needing Han Solo's help to get the droid to the Resistance base quickly, showing awareness of urgency and taking initiative.
Asks 'What's a Rathtar?' when the danger is referenced, indicating a gap in knowledge about threats in the environment.
Asks about BB-8 when told to stay hidden, indicating awareness and concern for the droidâ€™s safety.
Responds to unfamiliar reference (Rathtar) with a direct question rather than confusion, showing inquisitiveness and clarity.
Follows Han's order to stay below deck quietly, demonstrating discipline and restraint.
Shows quick thinking to protect themselves by suggesting to close the blast doors to trap enemies.
Shares her plan quickly with Finn, collaborating under pressure.
Works quickly and cooperatively with Finn to reset the fuses despite the danger, showing optimism by smiling after finishing the task.
Admits her mistake when realizing she set the wrong fuses, showing sincerity and accountability.
Attempts to reset the fuses to close the blast doors and trap the gangs, showing initiative and technical skill.
Realizes and admits that the fuses were wrong after the lights come back on, indicating an error or misjudgment.
Clearly distraught and calls out for Finn when he is kidnapped, showing concern and emotional connection.
Waits at control panel watching Finn's struggle and prepares to intervene, indicating protective and trustworthy behavior.
Quickly climbs out of floor hatch and moves through corridors with Finn, showing alertness and agility.
Covers her mouth instinctively upon seeing Rathtar battle, showing presence of mind.
Questions Finn's direction when escaping the Rathtar, demonstrating cautiousness and hesitation.
Loses sight of Finn and is momentarily distraught, but quickly notices control panel and uses it to locate Finn.
Rushes to help by taking Chewie's seat and priming the fuel pump, showing initiative and concern.
Screams when attacked by the Rathtar, expressing genuine fear.
Reaches over to fix the hyperdrive switch matter-of-factly, enabling the Falcon to escape and saving everyone aboard.
Reaches over and confidently hits the correct switch ('Compressor') to get the hyperdrive working after Han fails.
Quickly assesses and solves technical problems on the Millennium Falcon under pressure.
Works cooperatively with Han during the crisis.
Openly provides information about the First Order wanting the map and clarifies Finn's affiliation with the Resistance, showing honesty and straightforwardness.
Shrugs off her own importance by saying 'I'm just a scavenger,' indicating humility and a lack of arrogance.
Interacts cooperatively with others around the holographic map without dominating the conversation, showing tolerance and natural friendliness.
Clearly explains that the First Order wants the map and identifies Finn as part of the Resistance, showing situational awareness and clear communication.
Shrugs and downplays her own role as 'just a scavenger', indicating a possible modesty or lack of confidence in her own status or value.
Expresses quiet emotional vulnerability when seeing the lush green planet, almost in tears.
Listens attentively to Han's explanation about the Jedi and the Force, showing curiosity and openness to new knowledge.
Quietly expresses amazement at the green planet, revealing a vulnerable and emotional side.
Acts as co-pilot on the Millennium Falcon, assisting Han with piloting duties.
Accepts the blaster from Han, demonstrating confidence and readiness to learn.
Responds to Han's teasing about using a blaster with good-natured humor and confidence.
Engages openly and sincerely with Han about the offer to join the crew.
Considers accepting Han's offer but chooses to decline politely, explaining she needs to return home and has already been gone too long.
Considers the job offer from Han Solo but ultimately decides to decline, showing self-awareness and prudent boundaries.
Hesitates and looks off in thought when questioned about her home, indicating some internal conflict or uncertainty.
Calls out to Finn urgently, showing concern for BB-8 and their shared mission.
Barges into conversation with the smugglers, interrupting them without hesitation.
Grunts recognition and quickly hoists herself onto the tabletop, knocking over plates, crawling toward Finn; shows urgency and decisiveness.
Insists on continuing the mission to get BB-8 back to Finn's base despite Finn's desire to run; demonstrates resolve and commitment.
Barges into a tense conversation with alien smugglers and interrupts; shows assertiveness but may indicate impulsiveness.
Persistently tries to convince Finn not to leave, showing emotional insight and concern.
Follows the sound of a crying girl into an unfamiliar basement corridor despite confusion and hesitation.
Lets Finn leave despite her emotional distress and desire to keep him, accepting reality with quiet resignation.
Uncertain about why she is drawn to the basement but still proceeds cautiously.
Shows hesitation and confusion about the situation she is entering but still moves forward.
Moves cautiously and shows fear and hesitation when encountering the mysterious box and lightsaber.
Moves into the dark, small, vaulted storage room despite feeling unsure and afraid, drawn by a mysterious energy.
Reaches out slowly and opens the old wooden box containing Luke Skywalker's lightsaber despite hesitation and fear.
Withdraws her hand quickly after the lightsaber ignites and hears the mechanical breathing, showing caution.
Looks around confused by the visions and voices she experiences in the Force vision, showing some uncertainty.
As a child, sobs hysterically and pleads for the departing starship to come back.
Losingly emotionally overwhelmed and confused by visions but still responds with fear and vulnerability rather than hostility.
Screams and falls back when confronted suddenly by Kylo Ren, indicating sensitivity and sincere fear rather than aggression or coldness.
Despite deep emotional turmoil, she responds sincerely with curiosity and openness (asks Maz what happened).
Moves toward the sound of clashing lightsabers despite fear and confusion.
Stops and screams when Kylo Ren appears suddenly, then falls back, landing out of breath and alarmed.
Is overwhelmed and speechless after Maz speaks to her about the lightsaber calling to her, but still stands fast.
Expresses immediate desire to return to Jakku instead of exploring the new revelations in depth.
Refuses to take the saber and runs away despite Maz's encouragement, indicating fear and rejection of a destined role.
Rejects taking the saber again and runs off, indicating hesitation and denial of her potential role.
Turns back when BB-8 approaches, concerned for his safety, and insists he must go back because he is too important and will get help.
Races through the forest, overwhelmed and exhausted, showing emotional vulnerability and uncertainty about what to do next.
Stops and listens to BB-8's beeping, attentively considering the droid's signals despite her emotional state.
Calls out to BB-8, urging him to go back to be safe and get help.
Races back toward the castle despite danger, motivated by concern for her friends in danger.
Fires back at stormtroopers only after being attacked and out of self-defense; shows protective instincts.
Encourages BB-8 to keep going and stay safe while she plans to fight off the pursuing Troopers despite her own fear.
Tells BB-8 to keep going and stay out of sight while she will try to fight off the stormtroopers, showing willingness to face danger despite fear.
Runs and takes cover behind a massive tree to avoid confrontation, indicating tactical awareness and self-preservation.
Appears terrified but acts decisively to protect BB-8 and evade enemies.
Keeps her blaster aimed, faces pursuer despite fear, fires repeatedly at Kylo Ren.
Stops firing and is unable to move when Kylo Ren raises his hand, showing vulnerability and restraint.
Keeps her blaster aimed despite fear and fires repeatedly at Kylo Ren, showing persistence and some combat skills.
Stops and is unable to move when Kylo Ren raises his hand, showing loss of control and momentary paralysis.
Remains conscious and resists despite intense mental interrogation and physical pain by Kylo Ren before losing consciousness.
Is captured and taken by Kylo Ren without apparent successful escape or resistance at this moment.
Wakes disoriented but addresses Kylo Ren calmly, asks about the others.
Wakes up disoriented but quickly assesses her surroundings and questions her captor about the location and the state of her friends.
Reacts with fear but maintains a mask of defiance when threatened by Kylo Ren.
Does not retaliate aggressively despite being intimidated and restrained by Kylo Ren, showing restraint and vulnerability.
Remains guarded and fearful when Kylo Ren probes her emotions, showing limited trust or openness.
Explains technical details about the droid's features under pressure from Kylo Ren.
Maintains a mask of defiance after being stunned by Kylo Ren removing his mask.
Reacts with fear and trepidation when Kylo Ren threatens her and probes her mind.
Unable to move or break free when Kylo Ren attempts to probe her mind, strains in agony but fails to resist fully.
Resists Kylo Ren's mental intrusion and refuses to give him the map, showing strong personal boundaries and resilience.
Meets Kylo Ren's intense gaze without backing down, demonstrating sincerity and courage.
Resists Kylo Ren's attempt to probe her mind and steal information, demonstrating strong mental fortitude and control.
Surprisingly penetrates Kylo Ren's own mind to discover his fears and insecurities, showing advanced force ability and boldness.
Maintains fierce eye contact and unwavering resolve despite pain and intimidation.
Stares intently at the Stormtrooper guard and commands him to remove her restraints and leave the cell door open, demonstrating calm confidence despite being captive.
Commands the Stormtrooper Guard to remove her restraints and leave the cell with the door open, demonstrating confidence and presence of mind even while shackled.
Her confidence wavers slightly when repeating the command, indicating some uncertainty despite her authoritative stance.
Calms herself and commands the Stormtrooper guard with authority to release her and leave the door open, then orders him to drop his weapon, resulting in her successful escape.
Calms herself and confidently commands the trooper guard to remove the restraints and leave the cell open.
Follows up command by telling the guard to drop his weapon, which he complies with without suspicion.
Is shocked and incredulous when the guard obeys her demands, showing some surprise at the success of her tactics.
Plans and attempts to steal a ship under dangerous conditions.
Demonstrates awareness of the threat and urgency by escaping Starkiller Base.
No direct action or dialogue in this excerpt, so competence not assessable here.
Peers nervously around a corner and takes cover carefully while holding the trooper guard's rifle tightly, showing awareness of danger and cautious planning.
Keeps focus and has a clear plan despite the intimidating setting of a great drop off and multiple enemies, indicating situational awareness and determination.
Quickly assesses the threat of approaching stormtroopers and takes immediate action by running, climbing down a ledge, and hiding just in time to avoid detection.
Uses her observation and problem-solving skills to find and open a hidden service hatch and infiltrate inside the walls of the base, showing creative thinking and resourcefulness.
Navigates through a dangerous and complex infrastructure inside the base with caution and skill, demonstrating physical agility and spatial awareness.
Climbs out from inside the wall to rejoin Finn, Han, and Chewie despite danger.
Is speechless and nearly tearful when Finn and the others come back for her.
Climbs out from inside the wall carefully, showing awareness and stealth to rejoin allies.
Is vigilant and immediately ready with her rifle when she hears a sound, showing alertness and quick reaction.
Shows emotional vulnerability upon reunion, momentarily speechless and tearful, indicating reliance on others but not a failure in competence.
Smiles and nearly in tears when Finn comes back for her, showing appreciation and emotional openness.
Thanks Finn after embracing him, showing gratitude and sincerity.
Expresses gratitude and emotional openness when Finn and others come back for her, showing social and emotional competence.
Responds vaguely when asked how she escaped, indicating either a mysterious ability or lack of clear explanation.
Quickly locates and opens a service hatch by manipulating machinery, showing technical knowledge and initiative in a high-pressure situation.
Gasp and scream in reaction to Han Solo being fatally stabbed, showing emotional response but no direct action.
Fires back skillfully under heavy stormtrooper attack, maintaining composure.
Appears astonished and somewhat uncertain when confronted by Kylo Ren.
Calls Kylo Ren a monster and confronts him despite being outmatched and injured.
Moves forward courageously trying to fire her blaster against Kylo Ren even while struggling under his Force power.
Does not hesitate to risk herself to protect Finn and stand against Kylo Ren.
Rey catches Luke's lightsaber as it flies toward her, despite being stunned by the unexpected event.
Rey ignites Luke's lightsaber for the first time with blazing eyes, showing confidence and determination.
Rey charges at Kylo Ren and battles powerfully, clearly rocking a skilled opponent.
Rey is shocked that the lightsaber landed in her hand, suggesting some initial surprise and uncertainty.
Holds her own against Kylo Ren and appears stronger than him for several blows.
Centers herself with closed eyes and then successfully counters Kylo Ren with powerful, precise strikes.
Stops herself from delivering a vicious, potentially lethal strike to Kylo Ren despite having the chance, resisting the pull of the dark side.
Defeats Kylo Ren in a lightsaber duel by disarming him and landing multiple decisive hits.
Resists killing Kylo Ren when she has the clear opportunity to do so, showing self-control and awareness of the consequences.
Cries holding the nearly lifeless Finn, showing concern and affection for someone she just met.
Hurries with Chewie to carry Finn to the Falcon to save him.
Feels deep sadness and sympathy for Leia upon meeting her, and shares a sincere emotional moment with her, crying together.
Sits with unconscious Finn in the I.C.U., deeply worried; kisses him and expresses hope and gratitude.
Smiles gratefully when Leia wishes her 'May the Force be with you.'
Looks at Chewie compassionately in the cockpit.
Sits vigilantly next to unconscious Finn, expresses care and hope with a quiet, confident statement about seeing him again.
Responds graciously and appreciatively to Leia's encouragement before boarding the Falcon, demonstrating emotional composure and readiness.
Looks at Chewbacca compassionately in the cockpit.
Glances back at Chewie and R2-D2 as she starts her hike, showing awareness and implicit connection.
Continues climbing the mountain determined despite fatigue, showing persistence but no direct warmth indicator.
Stares silently and patiently at Luke Skywalker without rushing or showing aggression.
FLICKS SWITCHES to start the Millennium Falcon and pilots it successfully into space and lightspeed.
Begins a long, difficult hike up an enormous mountain with determination despite fatigue.
Arrives at a remote, mysterious location and senses the presence of someone important.
Stares silently and without action at Luke Skywalker for a prolonged moment instead of speaking or reacting.
Holds out Luke Skywalker's lightsaber as an offer and plea, demonstrating confidence and understanding of its significance.
